errors.error_description: The installation command unnecessarily includes the `flask` package. Since `apiflask` lists `flask` as a dependency, `pip` will install it automatically, and specifying it manually could lead to version conflicts.
correction_candidates: Change the command to `$ pip3 install apiflask`.
Change the command to `$ pip3 install apiflask` and add a note to run `pip install flask` separately.
Change the command to `$ pip3 install flask && pip3 install apiflask`.
Change the command to `$ pip3 install apiflask[flask]`.
errors.golden_answer: Change the command to `$ pip3 install apiflask`.
